specifications.Finish: Mechanical > Embossed Embossed is a fabric finish that creates a 3D effect on the surface using heat or pressure to form patterns or designs. It adds texture and depth, making the fabric more visually rich and stylish
specifications.Care Advice: Knit When you receive a knit product, it may be stiff and wrinkled. This is because the fabric has been folded and compressed for shipping. To soften and straighten the fabric, you should condition it for 2-3 days at room temperature before using it.
specifications.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold / Gentle Wash with similar colors Turn inside out before washing Do not bleach Tumble dry normal low heat Do not iron Performance Cool Touch Cool Touch treatment is a finishing process that gives fabric a cool and refreshing feel. It helps absorb and dissipate heat and moisture quickly, keeping the wearer comfortable and dry in hot conditions. Stain Resistant Stain resistance works by preventing liquids from being absorbed and fine particles from adhering to the fabric. This can be done either by using fibers that naturally resist stains, or by adding a special coating that helps keep stains from sticking. UV Protection A treatment to reduce fabric exposure to UV rays through application of a UV blocking agent that absorbs or scatters UV rays. 4 Way Stretch A 4-way stretch fabric stretches and recovers both width and lengthwise, allowing it to move naturally with the body and return to its original shape. This provides a comfortable, flexible fit, making it especially suitable for activewear. Sustainability Certification > GRS The Global Recycled Standard is a voluntary product standard for tracking and verifying the content of recycled materials in a final product. The standard applies to the full supply chain and addresses traceability, environmental principles, social requirements, chemical content and labeling. Certification > GOTS The Global Organic Textile Standard is the worldwide leading textile processing standard for organic fibers. This certification provides credible assurance of responsible manufacturing with the least chemical inputs. Certification > OEKO-TEXÂ® Oeko-Tex is a registered trade mark, representing the product labels and company certifications issued and other services. Recommended Use Activewear, Swimwear
